application.ref: GROBID - A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents

titleStmt.title: Networks of the Great Awakenings: Classification of Puritan Sermons by Word Usage Statistics

analytic.title: Networks of the Great Awakenings: Classification of Puritan Sermons by Word Usage Statistics

figure.head: Figure 1 .
figure.figDesc: Figure 1. The four Great Awakenings in traditional classification (top); divided by modularity into 3 (center) and 4 (bottom) groups.
